name: Brain In Jar
description:
When you are a brain in a jar, getting around and staying sane at the same time is not always so easy.

Controls on Keyboard:

Left Arm - 'WASD'  

Right Arm - 'Up, Down, Left, Right' Arrows.

Play on mobile, PC, Mac, Or linux in your browser.

Created for Ludum Dare 49 game jam. I am interested in developing the game further so if you enjoyed this game and would like to see more levels and more game mechanics added, or you have suggestions or criticisms, let me know in the comments section. All feedback welcome.

Bennett Foddy inspired.

Created in Fancade.
